Text: this is interestign: the day when You can print Your own glasses, mouse and shoes etc. etc.  and not to mention spare-parts to things that You broke.
You must break a lot of things Zappaz
As a matter of fact TPB has a little known section titled physibles (under other). And the other day i saw a news item on 'print your own gun'. Only caveat, it might sometimes blow in your face !
